meanings.definition: A type of bread, typically round and flat, that is divided into quarters or wedges.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious breakfast with warm farls of bread.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sold fresh farls every morning.
meanings.sent3: As a joke, he tried to juggle the farls of bread but ended up dropping them all.
meanings.sent4: The farls of bread on the table looked like pieces of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked farls filled the room.

meanings.definition: To cut or divide something into quarters or wedges.
meanings.sent1: She carefully farls the cake to share with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The chef will farls the pizza before serving it.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally farls the paper while trying to fold it neatly.
meanings.sent4: The farmer farls the watermelon with precision.
meanings.sent5: The tailor will farls the fabric to create a unique design.
